text:
Given <tlib-version>2.0</tlib-version> in a TLD,
Jasper returns null when TagLibraryInfo.getRequiredVersion() is called.
creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM

text:
In jsp_taglibinfo/WEB-INF/taglibinfo.tld, change

  <tlib-version>2.0</tlib-version>

to

  <jsp-version>2.0</jsp-version>
     
because the body of the <jsp-version> (and not that of the <tlib-version>)
TLD element is the value returned by TagLibraryInfo.getRequiredVersion().
creator: jan.luehe@sun.com
